transform_def.name: designed30
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) s = tan(p_in.x * (p_in.x + p_in.y) / pi()) t = tan(p_in.y * (p_in.x - p_in.y) / pi()) u = cos(s * t) z = if r < twoinvpi() then sin(s * t * u) else fmod(p_in.x * fourpi(), p_in.y * fourpi()) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
